name: Joghop
overview:
JogHop builds exercise games for the iphone. JogHop wants to make exercise fun and create games for players of all ages.

Our first game, FitQuest is available for free on the app store. Players need to jog in place to help a baby squirrel reach the tree house, they need to jump over snakes, duck under eagles and avoid other obstacles.

FitQuest can be played in hotel rooms, before boarding a plane, while watching TV, on a rainy day, alone or with friends and family.
